name: Poke Abby
description:
Poke Abby will be the first installment in the Potions series of 3D interactive sex games. The player plays as a ghost of Autumnhearth who catches Abby wandering off to the potions classroom. The player has a few options to customize Abby before continuing to the main scene where they may poke, rub, and undress her until she invites them to have sex.
​
